named-query.name: XXAuthSession.getUserLoggedIn
named-query.query: SELECT count(obj),function('DATE',obj.authTime) as dateAuth FROM XXAuthSession obj GROUP BY dateAuth

named-query.name: XXAuthSession.getAuthSessionBySessionId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXAuthSession obj WHERE obj.extSessionId = :sessionId

named-query.name: XXPortalUser.findByEmailAddress
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPortalUser obj WHERE obj.emailAddress = :emailAddress

named-query.name: XXPortalUser.findByLoginId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPortalUser obj WHERE obj.loginId = :loginId

named-query.name: XXPortalUser.findByPublicScreenName
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPortalUser obj WHERE obj.publicScreenName = :publicScreenName

named-query.name: XXPortalUser.findByRole
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPortalUser obj, XXPortalUserRole role WHERE obj.id = role.userId and role.userRole = :userRole

named-query.name: XXPortalUser.getUserAddedReport
named-query.query: SELECT count(obj), function('DATE',obj.createTime) as createDate FROM XXPortalUser obj GROUP BY createDate

named-query.name: XXPortalUserRole.findByRoleUserId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPortalUserRole obj WHERE obj.userId = :userId and obj.userRole = :userRole

named-query.name: XXPortalUserRole.findByUserId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPortalUserRole obj WHERE obj.userId = :userId

named-query.name: XXPortalUserRole.findByParentId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPortalUserRole obj WHERE obj.userId = :parentId

named-query.name: XXAsset.findByAssetName
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXAsset obj WHERE obj.name = :name AND obj.activeStatus != :status

named-query.name: XXAuditMap.findByResourceId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXAuditMap obj WHERE obj.resourceId = :resourceId

named-query.name: XXGroup.findByUserId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXGroup obj, XXGroupUser groupUser WHERE obj.id = groupUser.parentGroupId and groupUser.userId = :userId

named-query.name: XXPermMap.findByResourceId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPermMap obj WHERE obj.resourceId = :resourceId

named-query.name: XXResource.findUpdatedResourcesByAssetId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj WHERE obj.assetId = :assetId AND obj.updateTime > :lastUpdated

named-query.name: XXResource.findUpdatedResourcesByAssetName
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj, XXAsset xAsset WHERE obj.assetId = xAsset.id AND xAsset.name = :assetName AND obj.updateTime > :lastUpdated

named-query.name: XXResource.findByAssetId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj WHERE obj.assetId = :assetId

named-query.name: XXResource.findByAssetType
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj, XXAsset xxAsset WHERE xxAsset.id = obj.assetId and xxAsset.assetType = :assetType

named-query.name: XXResource.findByResourceName
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj WHERE obj.name = :name

named-query.name: XXResource.findByResourceNameAndAssetIdAndRecursiveFlag
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj WHERE obj.name like :name and obj.assetId=:assetId and obj.isRecursive=:isRecursive

named-query.name: XXResource.findByResourceNameAndAssetIdAndResourceType
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj WHERE obj.name like :name and obj.assetId=:assetId and obj.resourceType=:resourceType

named-query.name: XXResource.getMaxUpdateTimeForAssetName
named-query.query: SELECT MAX(obj.updateTime) FROM XXResource obj, XXAsset xAsset WHERE obj.assetId = xAsset.id AND xAsset.name = :assetName

named-query.name: XXResource.findByAssetIdAndResourceStatus
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj WHERE obj.assetId = :assetId and obj.resourceStatus = :resourceStatus

named-query.name: XXUser.findByUserName
named-query.query: SELECT Obj FROM XXUser obj WHERE obj.name=:name

named-query.name: XXGroup.findByGroupName
named-query.query: SELECT Obj FROM XXGroup obj WHERE obj.name=:name

named-query.name: XXGroupUser.deleteByGroupIdAndUserId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM XXGroupUser obj WHERE obj.parentGroupId=:parentGroupId AND obj.userId=:userId

named-query.name: XXGroupUser.findByUserId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXGroupUser obj WHERE obj.userId=:userId

named-query.name: XXTrxLog.findByTrxId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXTrxLog obj WHERE obj.transactionId = :transactionId

named-query.name: XXUser.findByPolicyItemId
named-query.query: select obj.name from XXUser obj, XXPolicyItemUserPerm polItemUser where polItemUser.policyItemId = :polItemId and polItemUser.userId = obj.id

named-query.name: XXGroup.findByPolicyItemId
named-query.query: select obj.name from XXGroup obj, XXPolicyItemGroupPerm polItemGrp where polItemGrp.policyItemId = :polItemId and polItemGrp.groupId = obj.id

named-query.name: XXPolicyItem.findByPolicyId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItem obj where obj.policyId = :policyId order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicy.findByNameAndServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicy obj where obj.name = :polName and obj.service = :serviceId order by obj.id

named-query.name: XXPolicy.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicy obj where obj.service = :serviceId order by obj.id

named-query.name: XXPolicy.getMaxIdOfXXPolicy
named-query.query: select MAX(obj.id) from XXPolicy obj

named-query.name: XXPolicy.findByResourceSignature
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicy obj where obj.resourceSignature = :resSignature

named-query.name: XXPolicy.findByServiceDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicy obj, XXService svc where obj.service = svc.id and svc.type = :serviceDefId

named-query.name: XXServiceDef.findByName
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceDef obj where obj.name = :name

named-query.name: XXResourceDef.findByNameAndDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXResourceDef obj where obj.name = :name and obj.defId = :defId order by obj.level

named-query.name: XXResourceDef.findByServiceDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXResourceDef obj where obj.defId = :serviceDefId order by obj.level

named-query.name: XXResourceDef.findByPolicyId
named-query.query: select obj from XXResourceDef obj, XXPolicy xPol, XXServiceDef xSvcDef, XXService xSvc where obj.defId = xSvcDef.id and xSvcDef.id = xSvc.type and xSvc.id = xPol.service and xPol.id = :policyId order by obj.level

named-query.name: XXResourceDef.findByNameAndPolicyId
named-query.query: select obj from XXResourceDef obj, XXPolicy xPol, XXServiceDef xSvcDef, XXService xSvc where obj.defId = xSvcDef.id and xSvcDef.id = xSvc.type and xSvc.id = xPol.service and xPol.id = :policyId and obj.name = :name order by obj.level

named-query.name: XXResourceDef.findByParentResId
named-query.query: select obj from XXResourceDef obj where obj.parent = :parentId

named-query.name: XXAccessTypeDefGrants.findImpliedGrantsByATDId
named-query.query: select obj.impliedGrant from XXAccessTypeDefGrants obj where obj.atdId = :atdId

named-query.name: XXAccessTypeDefGrants.findByNameAndATDId
named-query.query: select obj from XXAccessTypeDefGrants obj where obj.impliedGrant = :name and obj.atdId = :atdId

named-query.name: XXAccessTypeDefGrants.findByATDId
named-query.query: select obj from XXAccessTypeDefGrants obj where obj.atdId = :atdId

named-query.name: XXEnumElementDef.findByEnumDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXEnumElementDef obj where obj.enumDefId = :enumDefId order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXServiceConfigDef.findByServiceDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceConfigDef obj where obj.defId = :serviceDefId order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXServiceConfigDef.findByServiceDefName
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceConfigDef obj, XXServiceDef svcDef where obj.defId = svcDef.id and svcDef.name = :serviceDef order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXAccessTypeDef.findByServiceDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXAccessTypeDef obj where obj.defId = :serviceDefId

named-query.name: XXAccessTypeDef.findByNameAndServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXAccessTypeDef obj, XXService xSvc where obj.name = :name and xSvc.id = :serviceId and obj.defId = xSvc.type

named-query.name: XXPolicyConditionDef.findByServiceDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyConditionDef obj where obj.defId = :serviceDefId

named-query.name: XXPolicyConditionDef.findByServiceDefIdAndName
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyConditionDef obj where obj.defId = :serviceDefId and obj.name = :name order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyConditionDef.findByPolicyItemId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyConditionDef obj, XXPolicyItemCondition xPolItemCond where xPolItemCond.policyItemId = :polItemId and obj.id = xPolItemCond.type order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyConditionDef.findByPolicyItemIdAndName
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyConditionDef obj, XXPolicyItemCondition xPolItemCond where xPolItemCond.policyItemId = :polItemId and obj.name = :name and obj.id = xPolItemCond.type order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXContextEnricherDef.findByServiceDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXContextEnricherDef obj where obj.defId = :serviceDefId order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXContextEnricherDef.findByServiceDefIdAndName
named-query.query: select obj from XXContextEnricherDef obj where obj.defId = :serviceDefId and obj.name = :name order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXEnumDef.findByServiceDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXEnumDef obj where obj.defId = :serviceDefId

named-query.name: XXServiceConfigMap.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceConfigMap obj where obj.serviceId = :serviceId

named-query.name: XXServiceConfigMap.findByServiceAndConfigKey
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceConfigMap obj where obj.serviceId = :serviceId and obj.configKey = :configKey

named-query.name: XXService.findByName
named-query.query: select obj from XXService obj where obj.name = :name

named-query.name: XXService.getMaxIdOfXXService
named-query.query: select MAX(obj.id) from XXService obj

named-query.name: XXService.findByServiceDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXService obj where obj.type = :serviceDefId

named-query.name: XXPolicyResource.findByResDefIdAndPolicyId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyResource obj where obj.policyId = :polId and obj.resDefId = :resDefId

named-query.name: XXPolicyResource.findByPolicyId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyResource obj where obj.policyId = :policyId

named-query.name: XXPolicyResource.findByResDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyResource obj where obj.resDefId = :resDefId

named-query.name: XXPolicyResourceMap.findByPolicyResId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyResourceMap obj where obj.resourceId = :polResId order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemAccess.findByPolicyItemId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemAccess obj where obj.policyItemId = :polItemId order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemAccess.findByType
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemAccess obj where obj.type = :type

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemCondition.findByPolicyItemId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemCondition obj where obj.policyItemId = :polItemId order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemCondition.findByPolicyItemAndDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemCondition obj where obj.policyItemId = :polItemId and obj.type = :polCondDefId order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemCondition.findByPolicyConditionDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemCondition obj where obj.type = :polCondDefId

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemGroupPerm.findByPolicyItemId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemGroupPerm obj where obj.policyItemId = :polItemId order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemUserPerm.findByPolicyItemId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemUserPerm obj where obj.policyItemId = :polItemId order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXDataHist.findLatestByObjectClassTypeAndObjectId
named-query.query: select obj from XXDataHist obj where obj.objectId = :objectId and obj.objectClassType = :classType ORDER BY obj.id

named-query.name: XXDataHist.getVersionListOfObject
named-query.query: select obj.version from XXDataHist obj where obj.objectId = :objId and obj.objectClassType = :classType GROUP BY obj.version

named-query.name: XXDataHist.findObjectByVersionNumber
named-query.query: select obj from XXDataHist obj where obj.objectClassType = :classType and obj.objectId = :objId and obj.version = :version

named-query.name: XXTrxLog.findLogForMaxIdOfClassType
named-query.query: select MAX(obj.objectId) from XXTrxLog obj where obj.objectClassType = :classType

named-query.name: XXUserPermission.findByUserPermissionId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXUserPermission obj WHERE obj.userId=:userId

named-query.name: XXUserPermission.findByUserPermissionIdAndIsAllowed
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXUserPermission obj WHERE obj.userId=:userId AND Obj.isAllowed=:isAllowed

named-query.name: XXUserPermission.findByModuleId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXUserPermission obj WHERE obj.moduleId=:moduleId AND Obj.isAllowed=:isAllowed

named-query.name: XXUserPermissionUpdates.findByModuleId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXUserPermission obj WHERE obj.moduleId=:moduleId

named-query.name: XXGroupPermission.findByGroupPermissionId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXGroupPermission obj WHERE obj.groupId=:groupId

named-query.name: XXGroupPermission.findByModuleId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXGroupPermission obj WHERE obj.moduleId=:moduleId AND Obj.isAllowed=:isAllowed

named-query.name: XXGroupPermissionUpdates.findByModuleId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXGroupPermission obj WHERE obj.moduleId=:moduleId AND Obj.isAllowed=:isAllowed

named-query.name: XXGroupPermissionUpdate.findByModuleId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXGroupPermission obj WHERE obj.moduleId=:moduleId

named-query.name: XXUserPermission.findByModuleIdAndUserId
named-query.query: SELECT XXUserPermObj FROM XXUserPermission XXUserPermObj WHERE XXUserPermObj.moduleId = :moduleId AND XXUserPermObj.userId =:userId

named-query.name: XXModuleDef.findModuleNamesWithIds
named-query.query: SELECT XXMObj FROM XXModuleDef XXMObj

named-query.name: XXPortalUser.findByUserName
named-query.query: SELECT Obj FROM XXPortalUser obj WHERE obj.loginId=:loginId

named-query.name: XXPortalUser.findByXUserId
named-query.query: SELECT xxPortalUser FROM XXPortalUser xxPortalUser,XXUser xxUser WHERE xxUser.id=:id and xxPortalUser.loginId=xxUser.name

named-query.name: XXPortalUser.findAllXPortalUser
named-query.query: SELECT xxPortalUser FROM XXPortalUser xxPortalUser

named-query.name: XXModuleDef.findByModuleId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXModuleDef obj WHERE obj.id=:id

named-query.name: XXModuleDef.findByModuleName
named-query.query: SELECT Obj FROM XXModuleDef obj WHERE obj.module=:moduleName

named-query.name: XXGroupPermission.findByVXPoratUserId
named-query.query: SELECT distinct gmp FROM XXGroupUser xgu,XXUser xu,XXGroupPermission gmp, XXPortalUser xpu WHERE xu.name=xpu.loginId and xu.id=xgu.userId and xgu.parentGroupId=gmp.groupId and xpu.id=:userId and gmp.isAllowed=:isAllowed
